hadiths.text: Narrated Ma'qil:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "If any ruler having the authority to rule Muslim subjects dies while he is deceiving them, Allah will forbid Paradise for him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنِ اسْتُرْعِيَ رَعِيَّةً فَلَمْ يَنْصَحْ
chapter.eng-name: The ruler not ruling in an honest manner
